alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 1:23PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Charles City and northeastern Prince George Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garysville, or 8 miles northeast of Disputanta, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Charles City around 145 PM EDT. Adkins Store around 150 PM EDT. Ruthville and Rustic around 155 PM EDT. Holdcroft around 205 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Taylors Corner, Chickahominy Shore, Sandybottom, Mount Airy, Brandon, Barnetts, New Hope and Roaches Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
